description: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island, Kokomi is a Hydro catalyst user who excels at healing, off-field Hydro application, and team support.
talents: Normal Attack: The Shape of Water
info: Kokomi is a 5★ Hydro healer and support who excels at off-field healing and Hydro application. Build her for HP%, Healing Bonus, and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: The Shape of Water
skills.desc: Performs up to 3 consecutive attacks that take the form of swimming fish, dealing Hydro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 3 consecutive attacks that take the form of swimming fish, dealing Hydro DMG.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Hydro, Kokomi plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path and dealing AoE Hydro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Kurage's Oath
skills.desc: Summons a bake-kurage made of water that heals nearby active characters and deals Hydro DMG to surrounding enemies.
skills.details_html:
Kurage's Oath
Summons a bake-kurage made of water that heals nearby active characters and deals Hydro DMG to surrounding enemies. Healing and DMG scale with Kokomi's Max HP.

skills.name: Nereid's Ascension
skills.desc: Kokomi summons the might of Watatsumi, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and entering the Ceremonial Garment state, increasing her healing and converting her Normal and Charged Attacks to Hydro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Nereid's Ascension
Deals AoE Hydro DMG and puts Kokomi in the Ceremonial Garment state, increasing healing and converting her attacks to Hydro DMG. Healing and DMG scale with Max HP.

passive_talents.name: Tamanooya's Casket
passive_talents.desc: If Kokomi's own Bake-Kurage is on the field when she uses Nereid's Ascension, the Bake-Kurage's duration will be refreshed.

passive_talents.name: Song of Pearls
passive_talents.desc: While donning the Ceremonial Garment, Kokomi's Normal and Charged Attack DMG increases by 15% of her Healing Bonus.

passive_talents.name: Princess of Watatsumi
passive_talents.desc: Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

constellations.name: At Water's Edge
constellations.desc: While donning the Ceremonial Garment, Kokomi's Normal and Charged Attacks restore 0.8 Energy for her upon hitting opponents (once every 0.2s).

constellations.name: The Clouds Like Waves Rippling
constellations.desc: Kokomi gains a 4.5s interruption resistance buff after using Nereid's Ascension. Bake-Kurage deals 30% more DMG to enemies with less than 50% HP.

constellations.name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Nereid's Ascension by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Moon Overlooks the Waters
constellations.desc: While donning the Ceremonial Garment, Kokomi's Normal Attack speed is increased by 10% and Normal Attacks that hit opponents restore 0.8 Energy for her (once every 0.2s).

constellations.name: All Streams Flow to the Sea
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Kurage's Oath by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sango Isshin
constellations.desc: While donning the Ceremonial Garment, Kokomi gains a 40% Hydro DMG Bonus for 4s when her Normal and Charged Attacks heal, or when her Bake-Kurage heals.
